Articles.Content:
So that everyone is aware, the forums will be under going an Archiving in the coming days. KSP Roleplaying, General Chat and KSP Development Threads will all be moved to the Archives section on the boards. These forums will be rebuilt from the ground up, and started over. Other forums will be archived as the need arises. This decision comes in light of the release of the Pay to play version of KSP and general forum maintenance. When this happens, we will let you know in advance.

-DR
Whoa wait a minute, I thought RP was being reset in three weeks!
Tim, some times you give me a headache. The RP forum will be archived in the same time frame as already stated.
It\'s a figure of speech for crying out loud. Relax.

It\'s a figure of speech for crying out loud. Relax.

I apologize for being too literal, but maybe it would be safer to fix that.
We will be able to ask a moderator if we want to move an archived thread to its new relative board, right?
